data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Constantino, Reginaldo (2012): Description of the imago of Noirotitermes noiroti Cancello & Myles 2000 (Isoptera: Termitidae: Syntermitinae), with new records. Zootaxa 3174: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.208822
